description: Polymer mini HTML file defining core Polymer features, including template preparation, content distribution, and DOM API extensions.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi
classes.description: Provides a wrapper around DOM nodes with extended methods for Shadow DOM and content distribution.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.ClassList
classes.description: Wrapper for classList property with methods that trigger content distribution.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.EffectiveNodesObserver
classes.description: Observes effective child nodes, including distributed nodes, with support for Shadow DOM.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.DistributedNodesObserver
classes.description: Specialized observer for distributed nodes in Shadow DOM.

classes.name: Polymer.EventApi
classes.description: Provides a wrapper for DOM events with cross-shadow DOM properties.

methods.name: _prepTemplate
methods.description: Prepares the template, importing and decorating it.

methods.name: _stampTemplate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the template content.

methods.name: instanceTemplate
methods.description: Returns a cloned DOM node from the template.

methods.name: attachedCallback
methods.description: Handles component attachment, triggering ready state.

methods.name: calculateSplices
methods.description: Calculates array splices for data binding.

methods.name: getInnerHTML
methods.description: Returns inner HTML of a node, with proper escaping.

methods.name: factory
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a DOM API wrapper for a node.
